entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18 except 14 along the lakeshore. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 18 except 14 along the lakeshore. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 06 May 2018
